title: Language Project Design Through Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Document Writing and Editing Skills, Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Creating and evaluating language project outcomes through real-time/asynchronous collaboration among learners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically organize language-related topics (e.g., business terminology dictionaries) by collaborating with team members using wiki tools.
Learners can manage document versions incorporating peer feedback using wiki editing features.
Learners can suggest two or more strategies to resolve communication issues arising during wiki-based collaborative processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
